content:
One of the Logical Models in the eLTSS is showing a new, exciting error "tructureDefinition/eLTSSServicePlanModel: StructureDefinition.snapshot error All snapshot elements must have a base definition [element.all(base.exists())]"
This appeared last week with an update to the IG Publisher. Can someone give me a pointer as to what is wrong with it?
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/eLTSS/eLTSSServicePlanModel.html
don't know why this is new; the rule hasn't changed. How are you editing the logical definition?
It came from the originators of this project.
Likely it was lovingly handcrafted by a team of experts...
I wonder if I should generate the base (it's predictable) in the IG publisher?
I'd be a fan of that. Or if you could point me to how.
